author: kaushalye
msg: Applying the patch sent by Dumindu, for exclusive canonicalization. JIRA AXIS2C-511

author: gsim
msg: Suggestions from Ralf Corsepius in http://bugzilla.redhat.com/220630.
* qpidc.spec.in (BuildRequires): Remove redundant cppunit here, too.
The previous removal addressed only the redundant _Requires_.
(%configure): Add --disable-static, so as not to build unused
* qpidc.spec.in: New file.  Use it to generate qpidc.spec,
substituting PACKAGE and VERSION from configure.ac.
(URL): Omit trailing .tar.gz name.  That's specified via "Source0".
* qpidc.spec: Remove file.  Now it's generated.

author: hindessm
msg: Fix condition for portlib native tests to behave as I expected it would and
make it possible to set -Dtest.portlib=true to allow testing on windows.

author: ayza
msg: Applying patch from HARMONY-2445 ([classlib][awt] java.awt.DefaultKeyboardFocusManager.dispatchEvent(null) does not throw NPE)
